content: प्रमादः {@--1@} Carelessness, negligence, inattention, inadvertence, oversight; ज्ञातुं प्रमादस्खलितं न शक्यं <ls>Ś. 6. 25</ls>; <ls>Ch. P. 1.</ls> {@--2@} Intoxication, drun kenness. {@--3@} ({%a%}) Fainting, swoon. ({%b%}) Insanity, madness. {@--4@} A mistake, blunder, mistaken judgment; <ls>Pt. 1. 39.</ls> {@--5@} An accident, mishap, calamity, danger; अहो प्रमादः <ls>Māl. 3</ls>; <ls>U. 3.</ls>
